security: This message concerns internal communications regarding the handling of intelligence information. Disclosing that REF B is intended for station use and not for wider dissemination to FBIS could reveal intelligence-sharing protocols and internal misunderstandings that could potentially be exploited.
summary: A cable clarifies that a previous message (REF B) was intended for station use only and not for forwarding to the Foreign Broadcast Information Service (FBIS). The message aims to correct a misunderstanding from the Hong Kong station.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET cable, originating from STAFF on May 31, 1978, is directed to the Hong Kong station to clarify that message REF B is intended for internal use by the station and not for distribution to the Foreign Broadcast Information Service (FBIS), correcting a misunderstanding that arose from the Hong Kong station's query (REF A). The cable confirms that the station was confused and that the guidance provided in REF B should remain within the station's operational scope.
title: Clarification on Intelligence Handling
